name: Heraldic Beast Twin-Headed Eagle
effectText: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control with no materials and 2 "Heraldic Beast" monsters in your GY; attach those monsters from the GY to that face-up Xyz Monster as materials. You can only use this effect of "Heraldic Beast Twin-Headed Eagle" once per turn.
